text: Thierry Chantha Bin (born 1 June 1991) is a French-born Cambodian footballer who plays for Malaysia Super League club Perak. He plays mostly as a Defensive midfielder but he can also play as a Centre Back. Thierry has represented Cambodia national team at senior international level. ==Club career== ===Phnom Penh Crown=== After spending his early years in French football, Thierry returned to his parent's country and signed for Phnom Penh Crown FC where he would spend the next 4 years and winning 2 league titles. ===Krabi=== For 2017 season, Thierry Bin left Phnom Penh Crown and signed a three-year contract with Thai League 2 side Krabi.OFFICIAL : กระบี่เซ็นแข้งลูกครึ่งกัมพูชา- ฝรั่งเศสประเดิมโควต้าอาเซียน http://www.goal.com/th/news/4280/ฟุตบอลไทย/2016/12/31/31014572/OFFICIAL- กระบี่เซ็นแข้งลูกครึ่งกัมพูชา ===Terengganu=== On 5 December 2017, Thierry Bin signed a contract with newly promoted Malaysia Super League club Terengganu.Chantha Bin, Hyeon Woo sertai TFC1 http://www.kosmo.com.my/sukan/chantha-bin-hyeon-woo-sertai-tfc1-1.567140 ===Sukhothai=== On 4 December 2019, Thierry Bin announced he will be joining Thai League 1 side Sukhothai.http://www.livesportasia.com/football/thai- league-1/patrick-vieira-of-cambodia-will-play-in-thai-league-next-year-lsa1541 ===Perak=== Thierry Bin is now a player for Perak FA playing in the Malaysian Super League ==International career== Thierry Bin expressed his desire to play for Cambodia early on but he could not make his official debut due to FIFA's guidelines on citizenship. Hence he mostly played in unofficial friendlies instead. In 2013, he was selected for the Cambodian national team squad to play at the 2013 Southeast Asian Games. He played his first national team match on 17 March 2015 in a 2018 World Cup qualifying match against Macau.
